channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Georgia roofer is out $12,000 after State Farm approved homeowner's claim — then refused to pay out in full
Huawei's new laptop uses older China-made chip, US curbs stall SMIC, report shows
I was diagnosed with stage 4 colon cancer at 31 despite being fit and healthy. Doctors brushed off my concerns as pregnancy symptoms.
US-Iran, Powell to testify, Tesla's robotaxi: 3 Things
Kroger to close Louisville location as part of nationwide closures. Here's where
ICE detains Marine Corps veteran’s wife who was still breastfeeding their baby
WATCH: Delivery driver helps overheating passengers on stopped train
item.description: A food delivery employee was seen on video throwing water bottles to passengers stuck on a train for two hours in the heat.

item.title: The number of abortions kept rising in 2024 because of telehealth prescriptions, report finds
item.description: A new report finds that the number of abortions in the U.S. grew in 2024 as more women obtained pills through telehealth.

item.title: U.S. embassy warns Americans in Qatar to shelter in place
item.description: "Out of an abundance of caution we recommend American citizens shelter in place until further notice," the U.S. Embassy in Doha, Qatar, said.

item.title: WATCH: OKC Thunder storm their way to 1st NBA title
item.description: The Oklahoma City Thunder made history to become the 2025 champions, dominating the Indiana Pacers 103-91 in Game 7 of the NBA Finals.

item.title: Man’s mother is member of church where he opened fire outside before he was fatally shot, police say
Israel-Iran live updates: White House 'confident' strikes hit enriched uranium store
item.description: U.S. aircraft attacked three facilities in Iran related to the country's nuclear program on Saturday.

item.title: Compass sues Zillow over its "Zillow ban," alleging antitrust breach
item.description: Real estate company Compass claims Zillow is illegally undermining competition by banning property listings if they don't appear on Zillow within 24 h...

item.title: ICE detains Marine vet's wife who was still breastfeeding their baby
item.description: ICE officers detained the wife of a Marine Corps veteran in Louisiana during a routine immigration appointment.

item.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs trial updates: SDNY to rest Tuesday; defense not calling witnesses
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs is charged with sex trafficking and racketeering conspiracy. He has pleaded not guilty.

item.title: May 19: CBS News 24/7, 10am ET
item.description: Russia launches its largest drone attack on Ukraine; "60 Minutes" looks at how A.I. and autonomous weapons have changed face of modern war.

item.title: WATCH: Car goes airborne after road buckles in the heat
item.description: A section of road buckled and sent a car flying as a heat wave impacted Cape Girardeau, Missouri.

item.title: Health insurers vow to speed approval of medical care
item.description: Some of the nation's health insurers say they're taking steps to speed the process by which doctors approve medical care.
